metadata.Title: CVE-2020-11035 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: In GLPI after version 0.83.3 and before version 9.4.6, the CSRF tokens aregenerated using an insecure algorithm. The implementation uses rand anduniqid and MD5 which does not provide secure values. This is fixed inversion 9.4.6.

criterions.comment: glpi: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
